programme.sub-title: S26 : E03 Dead Man Flushing
programme.desc: Officers try to make sense of a store transaction turned wrestling match. An intoxicated woman calls the cops when her boyfriend tries to flush her late husband's ashes. A shirtless man with a nasty attitude defies officers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E07 Boat Guy
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed chase with a motorcyclist. A man becomes verbally abusive with a woman and her mother after a boating trip. Police seize a rifle and 20 rounds of ammo from a man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E11 Naked Rental
programme.desc: Officers are called when a disturbed naked man covered in blood is spotted in a park. Officers find a nude couple in a U-Haul truck. A traffic stop over a minor violation turns into a dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E06 Kill ‘Em With Kindness
programme.desc: A belligerent gun-toting man doesn't take too well to some harsh parental criticism. A bike rider tries to outpace a policeman then pretends to be someone else. Officers try to coax a rattled hit-and-run driver into coming clean.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E07 Dance Fighting
programme.desc: A dispute inside a nightclub turns into a street fight. A man patrols his neighborhood ‘Old West’ style. A K-9 unit is called in to track a burglar on the run.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E02 Checked Luggage
programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E09 Poor Conflict Resolution
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E13 Wardrobe Malfunction
programme.desc: A suspect flees police in a truck over a misdemeanor traffic warrant. A man denies hitting his wife who has a bloody nose. A man denies ownership of his shorts when deputies find drugs in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E23 UC Drug Sting II
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect driving a stolen vehicle. A bio-hazard bin an illegal knife and drugs are found during a traffic stop. Agents go undercover in an area known for heavy drug activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E12 On the Run
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E11 Team Rescue
programme.desc: Officers rescue a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow-speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with extraction from a car. An officer assists in an apartment fire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E36 Last Call Brawl
programme.desc: Deputies chase a man who flees a routine traffic stop. Deputies find drugs on a man who gives them an expired license. Officers respond to a man attacking several patrons in a bar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E23 Bad Day, Bad Luck
programme.desc: A man is questioned for assaulting a woman on a train. Surveillance captured a man burglarizing a casino. A father kicks his son out of the house after his drinking becomes problematic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E04 Hitman for Hire
programme.desc: Police set up a undercover operation to bust a suspect who wants to hire a hit man to kill her husband. Unknown to her, the hit man she hired is an undercover police officer. The suspect denies doing anything wrong despite all of her crimes being caught on camera.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E24 Copy of Breaking Home Barriers
programme.desc: Officers respond after two men kick in a woman's door. Three suspects attempt to steal a bicycle in an alley. An officer arrests a husband for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E28 Bad Fences make for Bad Neighbors
programme.desc: Officers are involved in a high-speed pursuit of suspected larcenists. Officers give a driver a sobriety test. Officers report to a call of a dispute in a neighborhood.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E36 Don't Keep on Truckin
programme.desc: The occupants of a car with out-of-state plates try to conceal their identities. Officers investigate a vehicle lingering near a park known. An officer investigates a robbery at a truck stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E20 Up for Sainthood
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E13 I Take This Criminal
programme.desc: During an arrest, a suspect decides to pop the question to his girlfriend. An abandoned house becomes the target of burglary. Two brothers’ dispute over a business matter leads to violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E12 Blood and Scars, Bro!
programme.desc: A suspect races through the neighborhood after his scooter can’t outrun police. Cops discover a drugged, incoherent wild man lying in the bushes. Officers try to make peace between neighbors with pit bull problems.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E20 College Nightmare
programme.desc: The victim of a home invasion was held at gunpoint. A man in a wheelchair is in a stand-off with campus police. Officers respond to a call about a knife-wielding assailant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E03 Settling Debts
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E16 Familiar Faces
programme.desc: A group of suspects race a stolen SUV through a residential neighborhood. A drunk man has a kitchen knife and a listening problem. Two usual suspects are going back to jail for their latest escapades.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E14 Misrepresented
programme.desc: An officer coordinates a reverse prostitution sting to capture suspects who solicit prostitutes. An inebriated man is detained until he sobers up. Officers stop a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E22 Dude, I'm sorry
programme.desc: An Officer’s patrol of an area known for drug activity turns into a foot chase that ends with the suspect running into a tree. An altercation following a minor car accident is resolved after the men apologize for their parts in the confrontation. Two suspects are arrested during an undercover sting designed to capture online child predators.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E29 Crash Landing
programme.desc: Hiding in an attic doesn’t work out so well for a man who comes crashing through a ceiling. Cops stop a man with a broken car and a broken heart. Neighbors call the police when non-stop cussin’ interrupts their night.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E25 Dark Trailer Park
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E11 Pay the Price
programme.desc: Officers make an arrest in connection to an armed robbery with the help of the K-9 unit. Officers respond to a disturbance call at a local restaurant involving the manager and an inebriated patron. An officer pulls over a vehicle which later turns out to be littered with drug paraphernalia.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E31 Wake Up Jamie
programme.desc: Officers arrest a female driver for drug possession and whose mother scolds her before she’s carted off to jail. An officer arrests a man who alleges that he’s waiting for his date for outstanding warrants and a stolen vehicle. An officer takes a known prostitute to jail.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E15 Neighborhood Rage
programme.desc: A suspect ditches his bike then tries to outrun the police. Neighbors fight about a road rage incident using rocks and a baseball bat. Suspects in a stopped car attempt to hide all the evidence against them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E03 Uncomfortable Shoes
programme.desc: A suspicious driver takes police on a neighborhood chase. Officers are called to capture a 12-foot python hiding outside a home. Officers suspect a funny walking motorist is hiding something in his shoe.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E34 Naked Chase
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a naked man inside a school. A woman being questioned by Police is oblivious to her wardrobe malfunction. Officers on patrol order several female nude sunbathers to cover up.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E33 Be Careful What You Ask For
programme.desc: An irate man begs the police to shoot him. A drunken woman gets nasty after being arrested for domestic assault. Cops wade through lies as they make sense of a most dysfunctional family.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E21 Sinning and Thieving
programme.desc: Officers break up a fight between a couple in the middle of the street. Not even a church is immune to being robbed. A dispute between neighbors involves deadly weapons.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E06 Two Too Many
programme.desc: A man fights with his wife over a haircut then leads police on a car chase. A woman gets violent with her boyfriend and then calls the police on him. An intoxicated woman tells deputies she only had two drinks.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E04 You've Got Mail
programme.desc: During a routine traffice stop, an officer witnesses a cyclist get hit by a motorist. An officer investigates a domestic disturbance call involving some spousal infidelity. Authorities respond to a tip regarding a heavy weight drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E25 Scary Monsters
programme.desc: A resistant suspect thinks he sees monsters everywhere. Cops are forced to officiate a spousal wrestling match. Officers try to sort out where two motorists got their car and whose dope they possess.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E01 Time to Climb
programme.desc: A couple flees a routine traffic stop. An intoxicated woman climbs a tree. Construction workers are pulled over for a hand-to-hand transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E18 Bottom Fishing
programme.desc: At the conclusion of an extensive pursuit, the driver eventually loses control and runs into a stop sign. Officers stop a stolen vehicle leaving a known drug house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E11 Nerves of Noodles
programme.desc: A man tells deputies the pants he has on aren’t his. Officers are called to the scene of men firing an AK-47. A nervous driver fesses up to the deputy who stopped him.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E16 Being Honest Goes Along Way
programme.desc: A man leads Officers on a pursuit across county lines. An Officer assists in an undercover sting to capture drug dealers. An Officer finds a gun in a suspects car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E17 Family Therapy
programme.desc: Officers are flagged down and alerted to a group of armed men assaulting people at a nearby home. A fight between a father and his adult son takes a dark turn. A father threatens his daughter and her boyfriend with a knife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E16 Mean Girls Times Two
programme.desc: Deputies are forced to tase a man after pursuing him into a field. A driver plays dumb when asked about the revolver under his car seat. Officers respond to two teenage girls in a fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E06 Invisible Intruders
programme.desc: A homeowner shoots at intruders only he can see. The driver of a stolen truck claims he’s just trying to return the vehicle to a friend. A argument about parenting styles turns ugly when a gun is pulled.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E14 Jawbreaker
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, officers stop to talk to a young woman who appears to be soliciting prostitution. A father accuses his son of breaking his jaw. While running from officers, a suspect attempts to drop evidence on the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E35 Borderlands
programme.desc: Officers attempt to detain undocumented people crosssing the border. Border patrol discovers a driver with a load of drugs in his car. Officers check passports and a suspicious-looking laptop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E28 Hot Equipment
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E08 Killing the Vibe
programme.desc: A couple out for some fun get into trouble when they can’t wait to get home. The deputies of Alameda County set up a prostitution sting in a local hotel. Two women walking down Las Vegas Boulevard are stopped with suspicious drinks.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E19 You Didn't Get Very Far
programme.desc: A husky cyclist takes a spill when he tries to flee. Officers chase a suspect in a stolen car who says he was just fixing it for a friend. A man's denials of drug use lose credibility when cops find a meth pipe in his vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E18 Deja Vu
programme.desc: A traffic stop becomes dangerous when the suspect takes off on the interstate. Officers find a large bag of drugs in a man’s pants. Officers respond to a dispute at a familiar location.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: A Day in the Caribbean
programme.desc: The tropical island of Antigua.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 City Breaks Belfast, Ireland
programme.desc: Join our host in Belfast, as she explores a city dotted with Victorian buildings to vibrant streets. Starting from City hall to visiting RMS Titanic Museum in this episode of City Breaks.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Off The Grid Monte De Crystal, Gabon
programme.desc: Get ready to take on exciting wildlife adventures of Monte De Crystal with Emeline. The national park enveloped by misty clouds adds an ethereal feeling to nature’s canvas.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 10 Days Scotland Perth (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Bucket List Takachiho, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try bungee jumping at the staggeringly high Kobae Bridge. Following this, they explore some rejuvenating nature trails at Takachiho, stumble upon a shrine in a park, and learn the story behind it in a riveting manner, later that day.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Boarding Pass Tromso, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie Lowe visits Tromsø, the gateway to the Arctic, where he gets to know the Arctic ways of life. He enjoys a reindeer burger, tries his hand at ice fishing, and gets a taste of the culture and cuisine of the Sami, the original inhabitants of the Arctic. He also goes to Bodø, where he witnesses one of the intense whirlpools created by Saltstraumen, one of the fastest tidal currents in the world.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 City Breaks Munich, Germany
programme.desc: Often called Germany's most livable city, Munich is also one of its most historic, artistic, and entertaining cities. Until 1871, it was the capital of an independent Bavaria. Kristina Guberman admires the elegance of the city through its attractions such as the Gothic city palace, Residenz, the popular Marienplatz square and the stylish BMW Museum.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Food Guide Salzburg, Austria
programme.desc: Salzburg, boasts a culinary scene as sensational as Mozart, the composer who was born here. Chef Joe Remblance enjoys some of its celebrated dishes.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Off The Grid Lope National Park, Gabon
programme.desc: Emeline puts on her adventurous garb as she strolls around the gorgeous rainforest and savanna of Lope National Park.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeen (ENG)
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: The caldera, Mount Aso, is home to Japan’s most active volcano. It is also the perfect destination for those seeking an adrenaline rush and some breathtaking views. Amidst the various moods of the caldera, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore the unique experiences this caldera has to offer.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Boarding Pass Polar Park, Norway
programme.desc: The world’s northernmost animal park, the Polar Park in Bardu, nearby Tromsø, is home to many of Norway’s predators, and Jamie Lowe sees a few of them such as the lynx and the bear, but the most exciting experience he has is getting up, close and personal with wolves at the park. He also tries husky sledding.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: An overwater villa with a clear glass floor, and an underwater spa treatment enhance Kim’s experience of the water wonderland that is Maldives.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Food Guide Manchester, England
programme.desc: The dining scene in Manchester has changed considerably over the last 20 years. Stuffy fine dining places have been replaced with street food and flavours from across the globe. Joe Remblance explores this cosmopolitan approach that has seeped into Manchester’s culinary scene though European dishes such as Black Pudding and Tzaziki, Asian dishes such as Chicken Curry and innovative dishes such as a fried chicken waffle pizza and deep-fried Cadbury Crème Eggs.

programme.title: Off The Grid Libreville, Gabon
programme.desc: The capital of Gabon, Libreville offers an off the grid route to the host Emeline. From the scenic trails of Pongara National Park to exciting beach experiences, Libreville comes across as a pleasant surprise. But what’s more exciting is watching a number of sea turtles making their nests and hatching eggs near the beach. Emeline’s quest also leads her to a tête-à-tête with a conservationist where she learns about saving turtles.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeenshire (ENG)
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Savvy Nomad Bangkok, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: From meeting the “Queen of Bangkok Street Food” to eating Pad Thai at the place where it was born, Emeline lives a foodie’s dream in Bangkok.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Boarding Pass Bronnoysund, Norway
programme.desc: The small coastal settlement of Brønnøysund is flanked on one side by an archipelago of islets and on the other by rolling farm country, and Jamie Lowe experiences the best of both worlds during his visit. He goes hiking in Trollfjel Geopark, visits a sea cave and learns about the folklore surrounding the Troll mountains. He also visits a local farmhouse to learn about life in the Norwegian countryside, and goes on to try cod fishing.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: While diving in the cerulean waters of Maldives, Kim finds herself transported to a world, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur.

programme.title: Food Stories
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Stories, Chinese
programme.desc: Find out how the flavours of China have come to be such an integral part of the cuisine of Singapore.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Off The Grid Kavaratti, India
programme.desc: Through adventures such as parasailing at Kavaratti and scuba diving at Bangaram, Alex discovers the beauty of Lakshadweep’s coral islands.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Scotland Inverness (ENG)
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Savvy Nomad Lampung, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: At an elephant conservation centre in Lampang, Emeline experiences the immense love that the Thai people feel for their national animal.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Roros, Norway (ENG)
programme.desc: Røros, a historical Norwegian copper mining town full of impeccable wooden buildings, is a place that makes you travel back in time. Jamie Lowe strolls around the quaint town and checks out the mining museum to learn about the town’s fascinating history. Following this, he goes through Lærdal Tunnel, the world’s longest road tunnel, on his way to Flåm. Upon reaching, he goes to the Flåm Railway Museum, where he gets to know the exciting stories behind building the world's steepest railway.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 World Heritage Portugal
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.

programme.title: Food STories Singapore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Stories Singapore, Indian Influence
programme.desc: People of Indian ancestry comprise Singapore’s third-largest ethnic group, in fact, Singapore traces its origins to two Sanskrit words – ‘Singha’ or lion and ‘Pura’ or city. And yet, from fish head curry to Indian ‘Rojak’, Indian food in Singapore is something that confuses visitors from India. How did the “Indian” dishes of the Lion City come to be so distinct?

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Off The Grid Kadmat, India
programme.desc: From swimming with century-old turtles to visiting a coconut factory, Alex has many offbeat experiences at Lakshadweep’s islands.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Savvy Nomad Chiang Rai, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: While exploring the extraordinary temples in Chiang Rai, Emeline begins to uncover the stories hidden in their fascinating architecture.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 World Spas Shangri La, Malaysia
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries some of the signature spa treatments of the Shangri La Resort at Kota Kinabalu in Sabah, Malaysia.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 Xp Guide Cesky Krumlov
programme.desc: Český Krumlov Castle is one of the most important monuments in Central Europe in terms of architectural standard, cultural tradition and scale.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Minicoy, India
programme.desc: Alex sets out to explore the villages of the remote island of Minicoy and ends up at a local village feast.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Savvy Nomad Koh Tao, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Emeline visits Koh Tao - a small island in the Gulf of Thailand often referred to as a ‘diver’s paradise’.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Boarding Pass Oslo, Norway (ENG)
programme.desc: Oslo, the 1000-year-old Norwegian capital, is a compact and fun city that offers the perfect experience of contemporary cultural life in Norway. Here, Jamie Lowe visits iconic attractions such as the Nobel Peace Center, as well as more offbeat attractions such as the miniature bottle gallery and Frogner Park, which features 200 statues created by world-famous sculptor, Gustav Vigeland. He also tries the ski jump at nearby Holmenkollen.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Narlai & Jawai, India
programme.desc: The need for a short, refreshing break leads Asmita to a quaint hamlet in Rajasthan, where life has remained unchanged since the 15th century.

programme.title: Food Stories
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Food Stories, Malay
programme.desc: What does the cuisine of Singapore, which has almost entirely been shaped by immigrants, tell us about the culture of the land?

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 Xp Guide Cesky Krumlov
programme.desc: Český Krumlov Castle is one of the most important monuments in Central Europe in terms of architectural standard, cultural tradition and scale.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Minicoy, India
programme.desc: Alex sets out to explore the villages of the remote island of Minicoy and ends up at a local village feast.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Savvy Nomad Koh Tao, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Emeline visits Koh Tao - a small island in the Gulf of Thailand often referred to as a ‘diver’s paradise’.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Boarding Pass Oslo, Norway (ENG)
programme.desc: Oslo, the 1000-year-old Norwegian capital, is a compact and fun city that offers the perfect experience of contemporary cultural life in Norway. Here, Jamie Lowe visits iconic attractions such as the Nobel Peace Center, as well as more offbeat attractions such as the miniature bottle gallery and Frogner Park, which features 200 statues created by world-famous sculptor, Gustav Vigeland. He also tries the ski jump at nearby Holmenkollen.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Narlai & Jawai, India
programme.desc: The need for a short, refreshing break leads Asmita to a quaint hamlet in Rajasthan, where life has remained unchanged since the 15th century.

programme.title: Food Stories
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Food Stories, Malay
programme.desc: What does the cuisine of Singapore, which has almost entirely been shaped by immigrants, tell us about the culture of the land?

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 10 Days Scotland Perth (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Ahmedabad (ENG)
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeen (ENG)
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Backpack Pozarevac, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bulgaria Sofia
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeenshire (ENG)
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 Backpack Majdanpek, Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bhutan Paro
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Scotland Inverness (ENG)
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Backpack Nis, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bhutan Thimpu
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Backpack Sjenica, Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 XP Guide, Stockholm
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun

programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.desc: Red Bull athletes wakeskate off a Dubai skyscraper, race on Florida’s waters and Nevada’s deserts, and ride a skatepark on a hot air balloon. This is just a normal day for them! Don’t miss the action!

programme.title: Jaan Roose: Life on the Line
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jaan Roose: Life on the Line
programme.desc: World champion slackliner Jaan Roose makes history as the first person to walk a record-breaking 3.6km slackline across the Strait of Messina, from mainland Italy to Sicily.

programme.title: Ice Waterfalls
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ice Waterfalls
programme.desc: Elite kayaker Aniol Serrasolses pushes limits on his Arctic expedition in Norway, kayaking down a 20m-high ice waterfall – the largest ever recorded. Don’t miss this epic adventure!

programme.title: Flying Between Giants
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Flying Between Giants
programme.desc: Paraglider pilots Tom de Dorlodot and Horacio Llorens fly past four of Pakistan's tallest peaks, including K2, in one day, completing an epic high-altitude challenge. Don’t miss this thrilling feat!

programme.title: Fine Lines
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Fine Lines
programme.desc: The world’s top mountain adventurers face life-threatening risks. Their stories are raw and powerful, showing the strength and determination of the human spirit.

programme.title: Crossing Tasmania
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Crossing Tasmania
programme.desc: MTB rider Payson McElveen sets out on a new adventure in Tasmania, crossing Australia’s least populated state with a fresh mindset, free from racing pressure. Don’t miss this unique journey!

programme.title: Wild Waters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wild Waters
programme.desc: Nouria Newman, the world’s top kayaker, is an Extreme Kayaking Champion and the first woman to conquer Salto del Maule in Chile. She’s always breaking records and pushing the limits of the sport.

programme.title: Yamnuska: The Ragged Edge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Yamnuska: The Ragged Edge
programme.desc: Join adventurers Vikki Weldon and Quentin Roberts as they climb Mount Yamnuska, exploring its rich history and epic challenges. Don’t miss this exciting journey up one of Canada’s iconic cliffs!

programme.title: Valley Uprising
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Valley Uprising
programme.desc: The unforgettable story of Alex Honnold rock climbing in Yosemite National Park: 50 years of battling gravity and breaking rules. Don’t miss this epic journey!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E01 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Australian star Angie Scarth-Johnson teams up with climber Hazel Findlay to tackle Mallorca’s best deep-water soloing routes. It’s a thrilling mix of skill and adventure in stunning locations!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E02 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Angie Scarth-Johnson tackles a climbing challenge where every move counts, in the high-stakes world of Psicobloc competition, she must balance mental strength with physical skill to succeed.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E03 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Blind adventure athlete Erik Weihenmayer climbs a massive rock face in the Sierra Nevada. With camera work and animation, the film brings to life a concept by adaptive climbing pioneer Timmy O’Neill.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E04 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Japanese climbing legend Sachi Amma goes from three-time world champ to purist, finishing with a bold first ascent on Japan’s Mt. Mizugaki. Don’t miss this epic journey!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E05 Reel Rock
programme.desc: At 42, climber Chris Sharma takes on his toughest challenge with the first ascent of Black Pearl in Mallorca, pushing the limits of deep water soloing in this test of skill, strength and resilience.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E06 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Brette Harrington takes on an unfinished route on the remote Chinese Puzzle Wall, completing a climb started by her late partner, Marc-André LeClerc, in a heartfelt tribute to his legacy.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E07 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Barefoot bouldering expert Charles Albert tackles his toughest problem yet, L'Ombre du Voyageur. This impressive roof crack shows off his unique style with complex, challenging moves!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E08 Reel Rock
programme.desc: Join climber Molly Mitchell on her intense journey to complete the tough all-gear ascent of Crank-it in Boulder Canyon, a route known for its extreme difficulty and high risks.

programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - FWQ Challenger Silvretta Montafon - Live delayed Part 1

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno

programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.
